director.name: 丹尼尔·侯瑟尔 Daniel Hoesl

introduction: Beneath its reassuring façade, Davos is each year at the heart of the Western and capitalistic world. Every head of State and everyone who is someone in the money world meets with their peers in the Swiss village. What is really at stake at the World Economic Forum in Davos? More importantly: is it still acceptable that a handful of powerful white men decide what the future shall look like for everybody else?
